    • getAppByIndex

      public App getAppByIndex(int index)
      This finds the app in the arraylist by the index sent In. If app is found the App object is sent back else null
      Parameters:
      index - It is a int parameter which is sent in to find the app that matches the index.
      Returns:
      If index is valid and matches an app in the arraylist it is sent back else null.

    • isValidIndex

      public boolean isValidIndex(int index)
      This method takes in a number and checks if it is a valid index in the app ArrayList.
      Parameters:
      index - A number representing a potential index in the ArrayList.
      Returns:
      True of the index number passed is a valid index in the ArrayList, false otherwise.

    • isValidAppName

      public boolean isValidAppName(String appName)
      This method check to see if the app is in the system by the app name. send in parameter String of app looking for and if found in the arraylist true is sent back else false.
      Parameters:
      appName - A app name representing a potential app name in the arraylist.
      Returns:
      true if the app name is found, false otherwise.

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • deleteAppByIndex

      public App deleteAppByIndex(int index)
      Delete a app from the ArrayList, if it exists, at the index passed as a parameter.
      Parameters:
      index - Index of the App object in the ArrayList
      Returns:
      The deleted App object or null if no object is at the index location

    • deleteAppByName

      public App deleteAppByName(String name)
      Delete a app from the arraylist, by using the app name which is passed as a parameter.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the app in the arraylist
      Returns:
      The deleted App object or null if no object is at the index location.

    • listAllApps

      public String listAllApps()
      This method builds and returns a String containing all the app in the ArrayList. For each app stored, the associated index number is included. If no apps are stored in the ArrayList, the String "No apps in the system" is returned.
      Returns:
      A String containing all the app in the ArrayList, or "No app in the store", if empty.

    • listSummaryOfAllApps

      public String listSummaryOfAllApps()
      This method builds and returns a String containing all the app summary in the arraylist. If no apps are stored in the arraylist, the string "no app in the system".

    • listAllGameApps

      public String listAllGameApps()
      This method builds and returns a String containing all game apps in the ArrayList. For each game app stored, the associated index number is included. If no apps are stored in the ArrayList, the String "No apps in the system" is returned " is returned. If no game app are stored in the ArrayList, the String "no game apps in the system".
      Returns:
      A String containing all the game app in the ArrayList, or "No apps in the system",or "no game apps in the system"

    • listAllEducationApps

      public String listAllEducationApps()
      This method builds and returns a String containing all education apps in the ArrayList. For each education app stored, the associated index number is included. If no apps are stored in the ArrayList, the String "No apps in the system" is returned. If no education app are stored in the ArrayList, the String "no education apps in the system".
      Returns:
      A String containing all the education app in the ArrayList, or "No apps in the system",or "no education apps in the system"

    • listAllProductivityApps

      public String listAllProductivityApps()
      This method builds and returns a String containing all productivity apps in the ArrayList. For each productivity app stored, the associated index number is included. If no apps are stored in the ArrayList, the String "No apps in the system" is returned. If no productivity app are stored in the ArrayList, the String "no productivity apps in the system".
      Returns:
      A String containing all the productivity app in the ArrayList, or "No apps in the system",or "no productivity apps in the system"

    • listAllAppsByName

      public String listAllAppsByName(String searchString)
      It searches for an app by app name . A String searchString is sent in as a parameter
      Parameters:
      searchString - A String searchString is sent in as parameter invalid input: '&' what looking for in the app name in the arrayList.
      Returns:
      If the app is found by app name a String is built up with all the app that contain the searchString, and it is returned. if there is no apps in the system "no apps in the system" or if no apps match the searchString "No apps found for" + searchString is sent back.

    • listAllAppsAboveOrEqualAGivenStarRating

      public String listAllAppsAboveOrEqualAGivenStarRating(int rating)
      It searches for app that have a rating which is sent in as a parameter that equal or above and add it to a built up string and returned. If no apps in the system "no apps in the system" is returned or if no app what that rating "No apps have a rating of " +rating+" or above" is sent back.
      Parameters:
      rating - A int is sent in as a parameter invalid input: '&' if the rating is the equal or above the app it added to the string.
      Returns:
      A string of all the app that match that rating is sent back or "no app in the system". If no apps have that rating "No apps have a rating of " +rating+" or above" is returned.

    • updateApp

      public boolean updateApp(String oldAppName, Developer developer, String name, double size, double version, double cost)
      This method is used to update the app in the arraylist but only the super class parameters
      Parameters:
      oldAppName - This is the appName that your looking for in the arraylist.
      developer - This is the type Developer that you would like to change in the app.
      name - This is the type String name that you would like to change in the app.
      size - This is the type double size that you would like to change in the app.
      version - This is the type double version that you would like to change in the app.
      cost - This is the type double cost that you would like to change in the app.
      Returns:
      true if successful and false otherwise

      true if successful and false otherwise

      public boolean updateGameApp(String oldAppName, Developer developer, String name, double size, double version, double cost, boolean multiplayer)

      Parameters:
      oldAppName - This is the appName that your looking for in the arraylist.
      developer - This is the type Developer that you would like to change in the app.
      name - This is the type String name that you would like to change in the app.
      size - This is the type double size that you would like to change in the app.
      version - This is the type double version that you would like to change in the app.
      cost - This is the type double cost that you would like to change in the app.
      multiplayer - This is the type boolean multiplayer that you would like to change in the app.
      Returns:
      true if successful and false otherwise

    • listAllRecommendedApps

      public String listAllRecommendedApps()
      It builds a string of all the recommended app in the system and return it.
      Returns:
      Build a string containing all the recommended apps and return it. If there is no apps in the system "no apps in the system" or if there is no recommended apps it will return "No recommended apps".

    • listAllAppsByChosenDeveloper

      public String listAllAppsByChosenDeveloper(Developer developer)
      It build a string of all the apps with the developer matching and return it
      Parameters:
      developer - It is object Developer that is sent in.
      Returns:
      Build a string that contains all the apps by the developer and return it. If there is no qpps "no apps in the system" or if there is no app found from the developer "No apps for developer: " developer is returned.

    • numberOfAppsByChosenDeveloper

      public int numberOfAppsByChosenDeveloper(Developer developer)
      It will count the number of app by a chosen developer. It will take in object Developer and compare it to each app in the arraylist. It will add 1 each time developer matches the app developer sent in.
      Parameters:
      developer - It is object Developer that is sent in.
      Returns:
      It will add up all the app matching in int type and send it back else if no apps matches or app is empty send back 0.

    • randomApp

      public App randomApp()
      This method will find a random app in the arrayList and send it back as App object.
      Returns:
      An app object is sent back or null if app arraylist is empty.
